title: What to Pick Up at Sephora's Gifts For All Sale
description: We love nothing more than shopping for beauty products, but getting them on sale is the cherry on top. Luckily, Sephora is hosting its Gifts For All event, where you can get 20 percent off your purchase from now until Dec. 15 using the code "HAVEITALL" at checkout. You can also get 30 percent off Sephora Collection, the retailer's signature line. The code is valid for anyone enrolled in Sephora's rewards membership, regardless of tier level, and you can sign up to be a Beauty Insider member here for free. Unlike the annual Beauty Insider Sale, the code for this event is only valid for one purchase per customer, so check your cart twice for all your beauty essentials and gifting needs to score the ultimate discount. Whether you want to stock up on your go-to products on a budget or finally treat yourself to a splurge item, there is no better time to take advantage of the one-time use discount. Score deals on Kayali perfume, the viral Hourglass Ambient Lighting Edit Unlocked Palette, and your favorite flavors of the Ole Henriksen Peptide Lip Treatment. Plus, there are plenty of beauty gift sets you can snag for less for your loved ones and even yourself. Shop our favorite picks from Sephora's Gifts For All Event ahead.
author: Anvita Reddy
excerpt: We rounded up the best beauty deals to shop during Sephora's Gifts For All sale, including makeup, skin care, body care, hair care, and beauty gift sets.

We love nothing more than shopping for beauty products, but getting them on sale is the cherry on top. The code is valid for anyone enrolled in Sephora's rewards membership, regardless of tier level, and you can sign up to be a Beauty Insider member here for free. Unlike the annual Beauty Insider Sale, the code for this event is only valid for one purchase per customer, so check your cart twice for all your beauty essentials and gifting needs to score the ultimate discount.

(You can also get it in an array of colors, from mauve to pink to brown.)

The formula acts as a mini keratin treatment in a bottle, creating smooth and frizz-free hair with a silky-soft, glass-like shiny finish. Whether you're dealing with winter dryness or the skin-peeling side effects of using a retinoid, the Dieux Instant Angel Lipid-Rich Barrier Repair Cream can soothe your skin overnight. Packed with ceramides and peptides, this moisturizer hydrates and reduces irritation.

Kayali's Vanilla | 28 is another TikTok favorite that makes for a layerable winter scent. It has notes of vanilla orchids, tonka absolute, and amber woods for a warm floral fragrance that is sweet yet alluring. It's something you can get for yourself of the perfume lover in your life.

A Deal on Exfoliating Treatments

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare Alpha Beta Daily Peel Vault ($122, originally $153)

We swear by the two-step Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare's peel pads to help brighten the skin while fading existing dark spots and preventing breakouts. Right now, you can get this value set of 60 treatments for 20 percent off. It comes with 30 regular strength and 30 extra strength, so you can alternate depending on how your skin's progress. It should last you at least two months if you use it daily, or even longer if it's something you use every other day, or less frequently.

A Deal on a Shark Hair Tool

Shark Beauty FlexFusion Luxury Air & Ceramic Straightening Hair Dryer System with Diffuser ($319, originally $399)

The Shark Beauty FlexFusion Luxury Air & Ceramic Straightening Hair Dryer System is the all-in-one hair tool that delivers, blow outs, curls, sleek and straight looks from wet to dry. This multifunctional hair tool is the ultimate upgrade if you want to streamline your routine and hair tool collection, since it pretty much replaces it all. You can read all about it in our in-depth review of the Shark Beauty FlexFusion Straightening Hair Dryer System.

If you prefer to have a concentrator attachment, go for the Shark Beauty FlexFusion Luxury Air & Ceramic Hair Dryer System with Air Straightener ($399)

Editor Quote: "The FlexFusion Straight is powerful, yet easy to use. I don't have to waste time working on smaller sections. I can grab big sections to style and get precise, salon-quality results. I can go from wet to dry and perfectly styled in just 15 minutes....The Shark FlexFusion Straight is worth the splurge if you want to invest in an all-in-one hair tool that can truly do it all, especially if you want to streamline or upgrade your hair tool collection. It's ideal for those who haven't invested in a multi-tool device like the FlexStyle System or the Dyson Airwrap." - Anvita Reddy, assistant editor, Shopping

A Deal on an LED Face Mask

Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare DRx SpectraLite FaceWare Pro ($364, originally $455)

You've probably been seeing the benefits of LED masks all over TikTok this year, and you can snag the bestselling Dr. Dennis Gross Skincare DRx SpectraLite FaceWare Pro for 20 percent off during the sale. This editor-backed LED mask is FDA-cleared with 100 red LED lights for anti-aging concerns like supporting the production of collagen. It also has 62 blue LED lights for targeting acne-causing bacteria. It also has secure head strap, so you can get a three-minute treatment in while multitasking.
